Reference

All functions

N2finemapping

Simulated Fine-mapping Data with Two Effect Variables

anno_finemap_res()

Annotates cTWAS finemapping result with ensembl gene annotation database

assemble_region_data()

Assembles data for all the regions

coef(<susie>)

Extract regression coefficients from susie fit

compute_gene_z()

Computes z-scores of molecular traits

compute_region_nonSNP_PIPs()

Computes non-SNP PIPs for regions

compute_ss()

Compute sufficient statistics for susie.

convert_geno_to_LD_matrix()

Converts PLINK genotype data to LD matrices and SNP info files, saves LD matrices as .RDS files and SNP info as .Rvar files

ctwas_sumstats()

Causal inference for TWAS using summary statistics

ctwas_sumstats_noLD()

Runs cTWAS analysis with "no LD" version

diagnose_ld_mismatch_susie()

Diagnose LD mismatches using SuSiE RSS

est_param()

Estimates cTWAS parameters using EM

estimate_s_rss()

Estimate s in susie_rss Model Using Regularized LD

expand_region_data()

Expands region_data with full SNPs

finemap_region()

Runs cTWAS finemapping for a single region

finemap_regions()

Runs cTWAS finemapping for multiple regions

get_problematic_genes()

Gets problematic genes from problematic SNPs

kriging_rss()

Compute Distribution of z-scores of Variant j Given Other z-scores, and Detect Possible Allele Switch Issue

load_weights()

Loads PredictDB or FUSION weights

make_locusplot()

Plots the cTWAS result for a single locus

map_snp_info_regions()

Reads SNP info from all regions and map SNPs to regions.

merge_finemap_regions()

Merges regions with boundary genes and finemaps merged regions

merge_region_data()

Merges region data for cross-boundary genes

predict(<susie>)

Predict outcomes or extract coefficients from susie fit.

preprocess_region_LD_snp_info()

Preprocess region info, LD info, and SNP info from all regions and map SNPs to regions.

preprocess_weights()

Preprocess PredictDB/FUSION weights and harmonize with LD reference

preprocess_z_snp()

Preprocess GWAS z-scores, harmonize GWAS z-scores with LD reference

screen_regions()

Screens regions with strong non-SNP PIPs to be used in finemapping step

sum_pip_across_contexts()

Combines PIPs across contexts (tissues)

summarize_param()

Summarizes and plots cTWAS parameter estimates

susie() susie_suff_stat()

Sum of Single Effects (SuSiE) Regression

susie_get_objective() susie_get_posterior_mean() susie_get_posterior_sd() susie_get_niter() susie_get_prior_variance() susie_get_residual_variance() susie_get_lfsr() susie_get_posterior_samples() susie_get_cs() susie_get_pip()

Inferences From Fitted SuSiE Model

susie_init_coef()

Initialize a susie object using regression coefficients

susie_rss()

Sum of Single Effects (SuSiE) Regression using summary statistics

univariate_regression()

Perform Univariate Linear Regression Separately for Columns of X

update_finemap_res()

Updates finemapping result

update_merged_regions_finemap_res()

Updates finemapping result for merged regions
